title: Ham Pumpkin and Black Bean Soup
ingredients: ['3 (410g) tins black beans, rinsed and drained', '1 (400) tin chopped tomatoes', '50g butter', '150g chopped onion', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 litre beef stock', '425g pumpkin puree', '225g cubed cooked ham', '3 tablespoons sherry vinegar']
